scripts.git:push: sh -lc 'set -euo pipefail; : "${MSG:?MSG is required}"; git add .; git commit -m "$MSG"'
scripts.git:push-remote: sh -lc 'set -euo pipefail; b="${BRANCH:-$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)}"; git push origin "$b"'
scripts.push:patch: sh -lc 'set -euo pipefail; : "${MSG:?MSG is required}"; pnpm git:push && pnpm version patch'
scripts.push:minor: sh -lc 'set -euo pipefail; : "${MSG:?MSG is required}"; pnpm git:push && pnpm version minor'
scripts.push:major: sh -lc 'set -euo pipefail; : "${MSG:?MSG is required}"; pnpm git:push && pnpm version major'
scripts.push:patch:publish: sh -lc 'set -euo pipefail; : "${MSG:?MSG is required}"; pnpm push:patch && pnpm publish:public && pnpm push-tags && pnpm git:push-remote'
scripts.push:minor:publish: sh -lc 'set -euo pipefail; : "${MSG:?MSG is required}"; pnpm push:minor && pnpm publish:public && pnpm push-tags && pnpm git:push-remote'
scripts.push:major:publish: sh -lc 'set -euo pipefail; : "${MSG:?MSG is required}"; pnpm push:major && pnpm publish:public && pnpm push-tags && pnpm git:push-remote'
